title: Unpuzzle Master
description: Unpuzzle master plan and execute your moves strategically to become the master, navigating through bottlenecks and utilizing “exit” strategies effectively. Touch the tile to move it in the direction of the tile. Complete each level that really challenges your brain to think sharper. Choose from a variety of themes and skins to customize your block-puzzle adventure. Each skin not only changes the visual aesthetic but also improves the way you interact with the puzzles, making every move count.
instructions: PC : Use the left mouse button to move block. Mobile : Touch a tile to move the block.

title: Hexa Tile Master
description: Welcome to Hexa Tile Master! Drag stacks of hex tiles from the bottom of your screen to empty spots on the board. Watch as similar tiles merge into bigger stacks, and collect stacks of 10 or more matching tiles to clear them. Your goal is to clear all the hex tiles before time runs out. Each level gets more challenging, but don't worry—fun animations and exciting rewards will keep you engaged. Enjoy the strategic fun and see how far you can go!
instructions: You can move stacks using touch or mouse.

title: Join Clash Color Button
description: Are you ready for a game of choices and surprises? Color Button is the game for you! You need to pick the right door and make it to the end safely. But be careful, each door can lead to a different challenge or enemy. You have to use your skills and strategies to avoid traps and obstacles. Teamwork is the key to success in this game. Color Button is an exciting game that tests your judgment and decision-making skills. Do you have what it takes to beat the enemies and reach the end?
instructions: Tap to play

title: Shape Transform Race
description: Shape Transform Race is a fun racing game that can be played in reaction-based 1 and 2 player game modes. You can play the game against bots or against your friend. Always be the fastest by choosing the right vehicle for the terrain! You can unlock new vehicles and characters with the coins you earn from the races.
instructions: You can use "MOUSE" or touch controls to change vehicles. For 2 player mode, you can use "A,S,D" and "J,K,L" keys for shortcuts to change vehicles.

title: Barrel Roller - Amazing Runner
description: Collect and stack barrels, avoid obstacles, and make the highest barrel stack ever! Unlimited levels of stacking satisfaction!
instructions: Swipe left-right to collect barrels and avoid obstacles.

title: Serious Bro
description: Defend your base against adorable alien invaders using an M16 Carbine Rifle and frag grenades. Experience a beautiful low poly 3D environment with cute enemies and simple controls for both desktop and mobile.
instructions: Defend your base from cute alien invaders with your M16 and some grenades.

title: Drill Quest
description: Drill Quest is a casual game combining the excitement of crushing blocks, upgrading your drill, and building your city. Explore diverse locations, progressively upgrade your equipment, and choose from machines.
instructions: - WASD or arrow keys to move - Left mouse button to interact with in-game UI

title: Octonauts Bubbles
description: Help Captain Barnacles, Peso and Kwazii to rescue Dashi in a thrilling adventure where you must drive the GUP-A ship in the Octonauts underwater world and reach the Whale Shark overcoming all the obstacles that you'll find in your way. Help Captain Barnacles complete all the levels of this amazing underwater Bubbles game
instructions: Match three Octonauts badges to make them disappear until you clear them all to advance to the next level.

title: Phone Case Diy 5
description: Phone Case DIY 5 is a popular Art Game. For children who like this series very much, you must be eager to play this game! In this new DIY phone case game, we changed the style of the game, changing the previous 2D style to the current 3D style. At the same time, we have also added patterns, decorations, stickers, etc. that can be selected. At the same time, we have also added an album function, you can save your masterpieces to the album, and you can view your own artworks at any time.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Jeli2D
description: A game in the genre of 2048. Skillfully use the game physics to your advantage. The goal of the game is to connect the jell to the maximum size and not to lose. There is a boosters in the game, which will make it fun and easier to pass the game.
instructions: 1. At the start it will be easy to connect the jell, but as time goes on it will get bigger and bigger. Once you connect a big jell, it will disappear and give you a huge amount of points! If the playing field overflows and the jell is on the line and stays on it for a while, you will lose, and the game will start again! 2. Press and hold your finger or mouse to control the jell. Release your finger or mouse button to make the jell fall on the field!

title: Robot Band - Find the Differences
description: Spot all the differences you can find in the pictures of these lively robots playing their instruments and do it fast! Try to find all the differences in each picture before the time runs out. Be careful though: Do not touch the screen randomly trying to catch all the differences this way! If you touch the screen 5 times without touching one of the differences is game over!
instructions: When you spot a difference between the images touch it or click on it

title: Shoot The Bottle
description: You’re at an abandoned gas station with really nothing else to do. Why not grab a couple rounds to kill time. In this immersive 3D game, your goal is simple: shoot as many bottles as you can. With limited time, precision, and speed are key to achieving the highest score. Tap or click to shoot the bottles. Shoot fast, shoot accurate to get the best score!
instructions: Shoot bottles in this fast-paced 3D game, aiming for the highest score with speed and accuracy.

title: Family Tree Emoji
description: Is a logic game that combines the excitement of deciphering with the surprise of bizarre combinations. The game will come across family trees with missing cells, you need to choose the emoji that fits into that gap. Look at the parents and children to find commonalities and complete all levels.
instructions: A family tree with emoji has gaps, note the commonalities and differences. Think of a variant and drag the emoji to an empty slot.

title: Drop Bricks Breaker
description: Drop Bricks Breaker is an interesting casual puzzle game. You can relax yourself during play time. You only need to tap the screen to aim the bricks, then launch the ball. Isn't easy it? Come to try it now! Have a great time!
instructions: Tap to launch

title: Candy Maker: Dessert Games
description: Do you like match-3 games, candies, and delicious cakes? Solve sweet riddles, move puzzles, and collect culinary masterpieces! Train your brain by solving exciting puzzles! Rich graphics and pleasant music will help you relax to your advantage!
instructions: ★ The goal of the game is to collect as many delicious candies as possible. To do this, combine plates with different pieces so that they merge into one large candy. ★ The controls are simple. To move plates, hold down the left mouse button on a desktop or slide your finger across the screen on a mobile device. ★ Become a candy making master and take first place on the leaderboard!

title: Bell Madness
description: Get ready to have some fun with your neighbors! This game lets you be a bit nosy and test your neighbor's patience with playful pranks. Knock on their door, tap their window, ring their doorbell nonstop, turn their faucet on and off, or even shake their mailbox to see their funny reactions! Earn coins for each prank you pull off and use them to unlock a variety of new doorbells with unique sounds. You can also use those coins to buy hints for more reactions.
instructions: Use MOUSE to play the game.

title: Idle Factory Empire
description: Make sure those boxes are shipped FAST! Click on factory buttons to upgrade your productivity. Earn cash and reinvest to upgrade your factory production. Be sure to earn extra bonuses from balloons and drones. Follow the advice of the IT guy and engineer to crank those profits UP. Oh, and did we mention that your money is piling up as we speak? Go offline, return and claim profits.
instructions: GROW your factory, SHIP products and earn PROFITS

title: Tower of Fall
description: In the game "Tower Fall," you must navigate a complex tower, collecting coins to purchase various outfits and weapon upgrades, while battling enemy mobs to reach the final level.
instructions: Collect coins and jump down, avoid monsters, and reach the top!

title: Fishing Life
description: Fishing Life—a relaxing clicker game with 2D cartoon visuals. Choose your target fish, click the water to reel it in, and manage its energy. Prioritize upgrading Strength first. Skins enhance tap strength, outfits boost damage, and Keepnet nets extra prices. Assistants increase Income, Strength, Damage, and Price. Open chests and claim cash from charged drift bottles. Luck might grant you treasure chests—open them for valuable assistants!
instructions: Keep tapping on the screen

title: Cannon Merge
description: Beat off waves of snow monsters, connect cannons to get more and more improved cannon models. Monsters are strong and there are a lot of them, they constantly attack. Upgrade the base and guns, defeat them all!
instructions: Connect identical guns to get a more powerful cannon, destroyed monsters bring coins with which you can buy new guns. For coins, you can also improve the base by making it stronger and repairing damage You can also strengthen the guns by pumping each one to the maximum level. If you can't repel the wave, upgrade new guns and try again. The game saves all the data at the beginning of a new wave.

title: Mutant run
description: When you are running on a track full of various obstacles, you need to choose to go through the mutation gate to evolve your body, gain the talents of specific animals, and clear the obstacles in the road!
instructions: Swipe the screen to control character movement

title: Bomb Evolution
description: Bomb Evolution is a cannon-shooting arcade game. On the mysterious and mist-shrouded island, you have the opportunity to strategically establish not one, but three main bases, bolstered by an additional rocket. Engage in an enthralling battle against a formidable opponent, both of you operating under identical circumstances. Your ultimate objective: obliterating all the enemy's main bases positioned on the neighboring fog-laden island. May victory in this war be your prized accomplishment!
instructions: Swipe to shoot, Release to launch bombs

title: Donut Box
description: Enjoy the delightful Donut Box, a casual HTML5 slide game featuring beautiful designs of various donuts and cupcakes. Each level presents a new arrangement of sweets for you to slide and match. With its engaging graphics and fun gameplay, Donut Box is perfect for players looking for a light and enjoyable gaming experience. Try Donut Box today and enjoy a sweet and engaging gaming experience!
instructions: In this game, you should put the donuts and cupcakes in the box in the correct order to make the box ready. You should notice the numbers and blank spaces on the box and slide the donuts and cupcakes to pass the level. As you progress, you'll collect coins by passing levels. Use these coins to change the background texture and personalize your game.

title: Griddlers Deluxe
description: Welcome to Griddlers Deluxe! Immerse yourself in a world of captivating puzzles. Uncover hidden images by deciphering numerical clues on the grid. With almost 200 challenges, Griddlers Deluxe offers addictive brain-teasing fun. Ready to decode the mysteries? Play now!
instructions: Each row and column has hints that tell you the number of tiles that need to be filled in that row or column. Multiple numbers indicate multiple sets of tiles to be filled, with each set requiring at least one empty tile between them and another set.

title: Visual Memory Drag Drop
description: Immerse yourself in a thrilling memory challenge where you need to memorize patterns and recreate them by dragging and dropping circles. This game starts off easy, allowing you to get comfortable with the mechanics, but the difficulty ramps up quickly, especially by the time you reach the fifth level. Each round presents a new pattern to remember, testing your memory and attention to detail. The engaging gameplay and increasing difficulty make it a perfect test for your cognitive skills.
instructions: Memorize the pattern and drag and drop the circles to recreate it in this thrilling memory game.

title: Fruit Balls: Juicy Fusion
description: Discover the exciting world of juicy fruits! The task is simple: connect identical fruits to create ever larger and tastier associations, heading towards the treasured watermelon. - Click on the field - Connect identical fruits - Create combinations to get bigger fruits. - Reach the last level - Don't let the container overfill - Earn money for new skins and try to pass with them ???
instructions: CLICK or TAP on your screen to throw an object

title: Microplastics Feeding
description: Microplastics Feeding is a game about a hungry fish who is looking for its favorite food: plastic! Help the fish to eat all the plastic things in the ocean!
instructions: Game controls: Touch click or press psacebar to change direction

title: Banana Bounce!
description: Banana Bounce! ? is a side-scrolling game where you lead your banana to as far as you can. Discover many cool ? and amazing ? powerups to boost ? your progress! Discover unique ? characters and earn coins ? while you run! Don't forget to upgrade ⬆️ your powerups to make them even stronger ? and better! Made with ❤️ by Realinspirer
instructions: Use click/tap and drag to control the character. Use tap/click to control the UI.

title: Dino Ranch
description: JON & BLITZ - IT’S VELOCI-TIME! • Throwing the lasso to the escaped compies • Dodging herds of ankylosaurus. • Finding the naughty compies. • Feeding Angus. • Flying and dodging objects with Pteddy • Moving the dinosaurs to the stable. • Challenging the Trihorn Raptor to a race. • Helping the compies to jump across the river.
instructions: Navigate through the app by swiping (touchscreen devices) or clicking (mouse devices) on the screen elements as directed.

title: Untwist Road
description: Collect cylinders, roll out the road and overcome obstacles in this unique game. It is suitable for all fans of arcade games who like to test their skills and reactions. Try all the features of the game, unlock new levels and beat your records! You only need a few minutes to fully immerse yourself in this exciting game. Try it yourself!
instructions: 1. Hold down the mouse button or finger on the screen and move left/right to control the stickman. 2. Collect as many cylinders as possible to make your way, avoid obstacles. 3. Get rewards and improve the characteristics of the stickman to play better.

title: Color Strings
description: Looking for a simple way to exercise your brain every day? Try Color Strings! This game features straightforward rules and fun, challenging gameplay. In this puzzle game, you need to rearrange the strings on the dots to match the given pattern. With various puzzle levels, you'll keep your brain sharp in just a few minutes each day.
instructions: In this puzzle game, you should reshape the strings on the dots to match the pattern shape. Each string on the puzzle board has a color, and you should use the same-colored string as the pattern. With each level progressing, the shape gets more complicated and challenging for your players.

title: Beach Soccer
description: Immerse yourself in a fun-filled beach adventure where your goal is to aim and shoot the ball into the goal while collecting starfish for maximum points. With over 20 challenging levels, you'll need to think strategically to navigate obstacles like crabs and sandcastles. Enjoy a vibrant beach setting complete with golden sand, coconut trees, and a soothing soundtrack.
instructions: Aim, shoot, and collect starfish in a beach-themed puzzle adventure with over 20 challenging levels.

title: Gelatino
description: Gelatino needs your help! He needs to collect as much ice as he can! The hot summer sun will melt him if he doesn't pay attention! But the road isn't safe: it is full of evil hot suns that will melt Gelatino in no time! Destroy them will make you earn more points, but the price to pay to make a highscore could be to high...
instructions: Touch the screen to move the player left and right

title: Nuts And Bolts Screw Puzzle
description: Nuts And Bolts Screw Puzzle is a puzzle game to remove bolts from the board, by moving the bolts to other bolt holes. The game will be finished when all the boards are gone This challenging and addictive Wooden Nuts & Bolts puzzle game will test your problem solving skills as you twist, turn and strategize your way through a maze of tricky Wooden tools. With each level, the puzzles become more complicated and complex.
instructions: Touch the bolt you selected, then move it to the available bolt hole, removing all boards from the game screen. When the board is stuck, it is your job to drop the board so that the game is finished.

title: Tiny Cars
description: Tiny Cars is a colorful arcade traffic management game where players must avoid collisions. With a top-down view and engaging gameplay, this game features 50 base stages set in various locations like crossroads, squares, and highways. After completing the initial 50 levels, players will encounter the same environments with increased difficulty, offering a challenging and addictive experience for traffic control enthusiasts. Enjoy managing the traffic and becoming a master of Tiny Cars, the ultimate arcade traffic management game!
instructions: Click on the cars to manage their movement. Keep an eye on all the cars to anticipate potential collisions. Some levels require precise timing and patience to complete successfully. Enjoy managing the traffic and becoming a master of Tiny Cars, the ultimate arcade traffic management game!

title: Wood Nuts Master: Screw Puzzle
description: In this physics-based innovative puzzle game, your objective is to strategically place screws and nuts to fall all the wooden blocks. Unleash your cognitive ability as you tackle each brain-teasing level, each one designed to test your problem-solving skills. From simple puzzles to complex constructions, this 2D puzzle game offers an array of challenges suitable for puzzle enthusiasts of all ages.
instructions: Use the left mouse button or tap on the screw, then tap to the empty holes to place the screw. Think well and find best spots of empty holes to place the screws. Be careful when placing screws as you have limited empty holes and some of which may become covered by the wood blocks you released.

title: Ninja Time
description: Immerse yourself in the world of samurai and ninjas in Ninja Time. Stretch your bamboo stick to navigate increasingly complex levels, collecting coins for new ninja skins. Experience Japan's martial arts era and become the ultimate ninja legend!
instructions: Grow your stick to reach the next platform.

title: Idle Town Billionaire
description: Dive into the world of entrepreneurship by purchasing lots in the town and building a variety of businesses. This idle game allows your businesses to automatically generate profit, even while you're away. Hire managers to boost your earnings and optimize your operations. Expand your business empire by strategically investing in new properties and upgrades.
instructions: Build and manage businesses in an idle game where profits grow automatically, even when you're away.

title: Two Dots Remastered
description: Welcome to Two Dots Remastered, a fun and popular HTML5 connecting game enjoyed by gamers of all ages! Two Dot Remastered’s gameplay is straightforward: Match two or more dots in the same color (not diagonal ones) and then blast them! Enjoy playing Two Dots Remastered, the ultimate connecting game for gamers of all ages, and become a master at connecting dots!
instructions: Find two or more dots of the same color that are adjacent (horizontally or vertically). Draw a line connecting the dots to blast them and score points. Plan your moves to create longer chains for higher scores. Two Dots puzzle also has 4 in-game boosters along with in-game items like Anchor, Box, etc. Use boosters strategically to clear challenging levels.

title: Organizer master
description: An engaging 3D puzzle with numerous levels. Find pairs and arrange objects so that everything fits. Develop spatial thinking and solve challenges. Enjoy high-quality 3D graphics in this captivating browser puzzle game.
instructions: The game is controlled using the mouse or your finger (if playing on a mobile device). Press the right mouse button or use your finger to drag and drop items to their desired locations. The game offers various locations and levels, each of which may present different challenges. You'll need to sort items of the same type, find matching items, and try to fit the required quantity into a box. Hints will accompany you throughout the game to ensure you don't get stuck and always know what to do!

title: Colored Bricks
description: Colored Bricks is a fun and simple endless game. There are colorful bricks and one on the top. You should move that one to the right or left. When it hits the same color brick, it will destroy all bricks of the row. The challenge is to improve your high score in the limited time that you have! Some bricks have extra time if you destroy them.
instructions: In the Colored Bricks game you may swipe left or right to position the top brick. Match Colors: Align it with a brick of the same color. Earn Extra Time: Destroy special bricks to gain extra time. Aim for the highest score within the limited time!

title: Headleg Dash Parkour
description: Touch controls have never been easier and more accurate! Run, jump, and climb walls just by tapping anywhere on. Pass the obstacles and raise the flag to complete the level. Difficult levels will make you addicted and feel challenged. complete all levels and try to unlock cute and cool skins
instructions: tap anywhere to jump and raise the flag to complete the level

title: Cargo Skates
description: No obstacles, no matter how high, can stop me from collecting more goods. Pass the obstacles and finally collect enough goods. Now, your supermarket can open
instructions: Swipe the screen to control character movement

title: Bridge Fight!
description: Stack Strategic bridges for your monster army to cross and defeat the monster enemies. Construct bridges wide enough to guide your army of monster characters to cross safely and face off against formidable foes. With simple yet addictive gameplay, immerse yourself in a world of tactical challenges where every move counts. Can you lead your army to victory and claim dominance over your enemies? Play Bridge Fight! now and let the fun begin!
instructions: Tap to stack the bricks and build the bridge. Drag around to move and avoid the Boss enemy

title: Sky Block Bounce
description: Welcome to Sky Block Bounce, the ultimate test of agility and strategy in a sky-high adventure! Your mission is simple yet exhilarating: jump on the blocks and navigate your way to the teleporter. But beware, each block behaves differently—some will vanish after just one jump, while others can withstand two or more.
instructions: Use Arrow keys or WASD to move.

title: Duck Hunting Open Season
description: Are you ready to go on an exciting adventure in the heart of nature with Duck Hunting: Open Season? In this addictive matching game, your goal is to pass challenging levels by collecting bullets and shooting ducks.Make items of the same type explode by combining them in groups of three or more. Your goal is to collect bullets and hunt ducks. Also use various power-ups such as Explosives, rockets and special hammers to create bigger explosions and go faster. Have Fun!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Falling Man
description: Fall for fun in this addictive hypercasual game! Ready for a wild ride? Join the thief as he falls from dizzying heights, dodging obstacles and collecting coins in this addictive hypercasual game. With two distinct locations to explore and endless possibilities for high scores, the fun never ends in this exciting game.
instructions: With simple one-tap controls and fast-paced gameplay, you'll be hooked from the start. Keep an eye out for power-ups like gravity boosts and magnets, and unlock new skins with the coins you collect.

title: Bus Collect
description: The aim of the Bus Collect game is to collect the passengers waiting on the road by making the right directions and deliver them to the finish point. To do this, direct the roads the vehicle will follow with arrow signs. Try to reach high scores by carrying as many passengers as possible to the finish point.
instructions: Use MOUSE to turn arrow signs and steer the car.

title: Hair Stack 3D
description: Hair Stack 3D is a hair running game. Go through the numbered doors and collect more hair. Dodge the obstacles that make you less in number. Your ultimate goal is to make more hair so that the bald head at the end can have beautiful hair! Are you ready to help him? Let him applaud you!
instructions: Slide to move

title: Idle Hotel Empire
description: Grow your hotel empire in this idle tycoon simulation game. Construct different hotel floors to suit the needs of your customers. This includes construcing standard hotel rooms, cafe bistros, deluxe rooms, meeting rooms for corporate customers, vip rooms, infinity pools, gym and fitness rooms and of course, the bougee presidential suite. Control hotel employees, move them up and down the elevators to move the cash, and finally CASH it in the reception office.
instructions: Build and grow your hotel business
